dict.acceptation: （改变…以）适应，调整，校正；调准（望远镜等），对准，校正，校准（机械等）；核算（盈亏）；[保]评定（赔偿要求）；

sent.orig: Zero adjustment function,forward adjust is forward biased,reverse adjust is reverse biased.
sent.trans: 零点调整功能，顺时针调整可以偏负，逆时针调整可以偏正。

sent.orig: If fate does not adjust itself to you, adjust yourself to fate.
sent.trans: 命运不能迁就你时，要学会迁就命运。

sent.orig: Adjustable concentric tray micrometer adjust wide Loading unloading structure can adjust ACF tacking wide correctly.
sent.trans: 所有收放料结构均采用可调式同心料盘及料宽千分尺调节机构来精准调节ACF贴附宽度。

sent.orig: This equipment use easy institution, Adjust sword-tool by the tilted-block, And reach adjust-convenience, High-precision, High-efficient.
sent.trans: 该装置利用结构简单的差动螺机构，通过斜块实现刀具的粗调和微调，达到调整方便，高精、高效。

sent.orig: When need to adjust cutting depth, get teacher's permission first, then stop planer and adjust it.
sent.trans: 调整切削用量须征得实习指导教师的同意后停车调节。
